credit_description_postroff.text:
Hi. I did the voice of that lil
fucker, i do art and voice acting,
you guys should totally play the
mod again until your eyeballs
fucking explode, idk, dou.

credit_description_hev.text:
Heya, i didnt do much honestly, just
the whole art, animation, music, and
the rival character design of this
mod. Idk man follow me i do variated
stuff on twitter.

credit_quote_goodiebag.text: Me when i have to shoot my dog because im bored

credit_description_goodiebag.text:
I didn't really do anything that
important for this mod, but I draw
stuff sometimes on the side and
I'm happy I was able to contribute
even the tiniest bit.

credit_quote_grimlock.text: Check Out vsSnails-House. Otherwise they will murder me                                       -
